name: Bachelor Project: Performance Optimization on Mobile
name_original: Bachelor Project: Performance Optimization on Mobile
description:
Bachelor Project: Performance Optimization on Mobile

This project is a graphic demonstration made in Unreal Engine 4 which shows a side street scene which got rebuild by the means of Ubisoft's "The Division 2".

This is a mobile app.

To see different angles of the scene press the interaction buttons.

To spawn infinite particles tap the flower bed.

______________________________________________________________

This is a bachelor project, developed from 04.11.2019 to 12.01.2019 (Duration: 9 weeks) by Jasmin Wodarczyk.

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

The bachelor project was supervised by Prof. Florain Berger and  Prof. Sebastian Stamm at the Wintersemester 2019/20 at the University of Applied Sciences Europe (UE Germany)

_____________________________________________________________

To install the app press the DOWNLOAD BUTTON.

Please install all files and put them into the same folder on your device.

After that Start the APK on your device.

______________________________________________________________

Github - Link:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/ba_2019_praktischesprojekt_jasminwodarczyk/s...

______________________________________________________________

I hope you enjoy playing this tiny Grafic Demo :)

If you are interested to read the whole Bachelor Project or have any question send an email to: jasmin.wodarczyk@gmail.com
